trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Når en tjeneste som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen finner et unntak som den ikke kan behandle den kan kalle den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>metode for å be arbeidsflyten runtime motoren opphøye den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten sender den <xref:System.Guid>arbeidsflytforekomsten og som er <xref:System.Exception>tilknyttet denne hendelsen i kallet til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren innkapsler disse parameterne i en ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs og hever den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Fra inni en abonnent til den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse, kan du lese den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å hente informasjon knyttet til en bestemt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntaket ikke kan behandles av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer unntaket ikke kan behandles av tjenesten.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId er lik den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Guid>
